channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on My Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on My Portfolio

item.title: SunScope: An application for forecasting yield in Crop Sunflower under climate change
item.description: The code for this project can be found on my GitHub Link to GitHub Repository The prototype version of the SunScope app can be found here: https://sammajumder.shinyapps.io/SunScope/?_ga=2.11639037.893216896.1682461636-683921061.1681565342 This study also resulted in a scientific paper that is currently under peer-review. The paper can be read for free here: doi: https://doi.org/10.1101/2023.04.07.536012 BACKGROUND: The global food production is vulnerable to adverse effects caused by a changing climate, leading to potential crop losses and affecting food security.

item.title: A Machine Learning approach to study plant functional trait divergence
item.description: The code for this project can be found on my GitHub Link to GitHub Repository A Shiny app was developed to articulate the results of this study in an interactive manner. The application can be found here: https://sammajumder.shinyapps.io/TraitDivergenceSunflowers/?_ga=2.257923650.893216896.1682461636-683921061.1681565342 This study also resulted in a scientific paper that is currently under peer-review. The paper can be read for free here: doi: https://doi.org/10.1101/2023.03.16.533012 BACKGROUND: Plants diversify across multiple trait axes and this is a hallmark of plant evolution.

item.title: Applying an interpretable machine learning approach to assess intraspecific trait variation under landscape-scale population differentiation
item.description: The code for this project can be found on my GitHub Link to GitHub Repository A Shiny app was developed to articulate the results of this study in an interactive manner. The application can be found here: https://sammajumder.shinyapps.io/TraitDivergenceIntraSpecific/?_ga=2.254737985.893216896.1682461636-683921061.1681565342 This study also resulted in a scientific paper that is currently under peer-review. The paper can be read for free here: doi: https://doi.org/10.1101/2023.04.07.536012 BACKGROUND: Intraspecific functional trait divergence is an important aspect of plant ecology, and understanding the mechanisms underlying trait variation is crucial for predicting plant responses to environmental change.
